title: LNMIIT TalkHub System
description: A mentorship platform connecting students with professionals to enhance engagement and learning.

title: LNMIIT OutPass System
description: Digital campus exit platform reducing administrative processing time by 90%.
highlights: Delivered a fully digital campus exit platform
Secured student data using JWT + OTP-based authentication
Designed REST APIs for exit requests and Pdf generation of exit requests
